sentences.en: Ah , by letter or by telex?
He rushed in with an urgent telex from Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 他手里拿着一份香港发来的紧急电传冲了进来.

sentences.en: He sent a telex to the British High Commission in Delhi.
sentences.cn: 他给德里的英国高级专员公署发了份电传。

sentences.en: Here's the telex . You may read it.
How do you go about repairing this telex machine?
sentences.cn: 你怎样着手修理这架电传机?

sentences.en: I had to send an urgent telex.
I shall send you the information by telex.
sentences.cn: 我将用电传把这一信息给你传来.

sentences.en: It needs qualified office personnel and good telephone and telex communications.
sentences.cn: 它需要有称职的公务人员,良好的电话、电传通讯设施.

sentences.en: KuwaIt'stock Exchange: POB 222235 , Kuwait City ; telex 44015 ; f . 1893.
sentences.cn: 科威特证券交易所: 科威特城; 1893年成立.

sentences.en: No , but as we haven't responded, I suspect it must have been by telex.
sentences.cn: 因为我们没回, 我想是用电传发的.

sentences.en: Please notify us of L / C number by telex immediately.
sentences.cn: 请立即电传通知我方信用证号码.

sentences.en: The telegraphic ( cable, telex ) address of the guest house is 6080.
sentences.cn: 招待所的电报 ( 海底电报 、 用户电报 ) 挂号是6080.

sentences.en: The telex chattered all day and night with news bulletins.
sentences.cn: 电传机没日没夜“嗒嗒嗒”地接收新闻稿。

sentences.en: This is a list of our products. If interested, please telex.
sentences.cn: 这是敝公司的商品目录. 有意请电传.

sentences.en: Yesterday evening I received a telex from my head office.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我收到总部发来的电传.

trans.tran_cn: 用户直通电报，电传，电传收发机
trans.tran_en: a message sent or received by telex

trans.tran_cn: 用电传拍发；用直通电报拍发
trans.tran_en: If you telex a message to someone, you send it to them by telex
